text:
The Windows installer has option
[x] Show Readme
that is checked by default.

It results in file 
"C:\Program Files\Apache Software Foundation\Tomcat 6.0\webapps\ROOT\RELEASE-NOTES.txt"
being opened in Notepad.

In TC 6.0.18 and in current RC for 6.0.20 that file has LF line ends. Notepad cannot properly display such files.
creator: knst.kolinko@gmail.com
markt@apache.org
text: Fixed in trunk and proposed for 6.0.x
This has been fixed in 6.0.x and will be included in 6.0.21 onwards.
creator: markt@apache.org
